bio: Co-Founder of @SevenLunches. Enthusiastic about ideas, tech, WordPress, cars, music, movies, food, beer & wine. Nashville transplant from Ohio via Michigan. http://7lunches.com Bowling Green State University Grand Valley State University SevenSpecials L.L.C.
